verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to her who is rebellious <S%H4784><s%> and defiled, <S%H1351><s%> The tyrannical <S%H3238><s%> city! <S%H5892><s%>

She heeded <S%H8085><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> voice; <S%H6963><s%> She accepted <S%H3947><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> instruction. <S%H4148><s%> She did not trust <S%H982><s%> in the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> She did not draw <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to her God. <S%H430><s%>

Her princes <S%H8269><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> her are roaring <S%H7580><s%> lions, <S%H738><s%> Her judges <S%H8199><s%> are wolves <S%H2061><s%> at evening; <S%H6153><s%> They leave <S%H9079><s%> nothing <S%H3808><s%> for the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

Her prophets <S%H5030><s%> are reckless, <S%H6348><s%> treacherous <S%H900><s%> men; <S%H376><s%> Her priests <S%H3548><s%> have profaned <S%H2490><s%> the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%> They have done <S%H2554><s%> violence <S%H2554><s%> to the law. <S%H8451><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is righteous <S%H6662><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> her; He will do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> injustice. <S%H9390><s%> Every <S%H1242><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> He brings <S%H5414><s%> His justice <S%H4941><s%> to light; <S%H216><s%> He does not fail. <S%H5737><s%> But the unjust <S%H5767><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> shame. <S%H1322><s%>

"I have cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> nations; <S%H1471><s%> Their corner <S%H6438><s%> towers <S%H6438><s%> are in ruins. <S%H8074><s%> I have made <S%H2717><s%> their streets <S%H2351><s%> desolate, <S%H2717><s%> With no <S%H1097><s%> one <S%H1097><s%> passing <S%H5674><s%> by; Their cities <S%H5892><s%> are laid <S%H9470><s%> waste, <S%H9470><s%> Without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1097><s%> a man, <S%H376><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H369><s%> an inhabitant. <S%H3427><s%>

"I said, <S%H559><s%> 'Surely <S%H389><s%> you will revere <S%H3372><s%> Me, Accept <S%H3947><s%> instruction. <S%H4148><s%>' So her dwelling <S%H4583><s%> will not be cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> [According to] all <S%H3605><s%> that I have appointed <S%H6485><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> her. But they were eager <S%H7925><s%> to corrupt <S%H7843><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their deeds. <S%H5949><s%>

"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> wait <S%H2442><s%> for Me," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "For the day <S%H3117><s%> when I rise <S%H6965><s%> up to the prey. <S%H5706><s%> Indeed, <S%H3588><s%> My decision <S%H4941><s%> is to gather <S%H622><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> To assemble <S%H6908><s%> kingdoms, <S%H4467><s%> To pour <S%H8210><s%> out on them My indignation, <S%H2195><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> My burning <S%H2740><s%> anger; <S%H639><s%> For all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> will be devoured <S%H398><s%> By the fire <S%H784><s%> of My zeal. <S%H7068><s%>

"For then <S%H227><s%> I will give <S%H2015><s%> to the peoples <S%H5971><s%> purified <S%H1305><s%> lips, <S%H8193><s%> That all <S%H3605><s%> of them may call <S%H7121><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> To serve <S%H5647><s%> Him shoulder <S%H7926><s%> to shoulder. <S%H7926><s%>

"From beyond <S%H5676><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> of Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> My worshipers, <S%H9442><s%> My dispersed <S%H1323><s%> <S%H6327><s%> ones, Will bring <S%H2986><s%> My offerings. <S%H4503><s%>

"In that day <S%H3117><s%> you will feel <S%H954><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> shame <S%H954><s%> Because <S%H4480><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> your deeds <S%H5949><s%> By which <S%H834><s%> you have rebelled <S%H6586><s%> against Me; For then <S%H227><s%> I will remove <S%H5493><s%> from your midst <S%H7130><s%> Your proud, <S%H1346><s%> exulting <S%H5947><s%> ones, <S%H5947><s%> And you will never <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5750><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> be haughty <S%H1361><s%> On My holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

"But I will leave <S%H7604><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you A humble <S%H6041><s%> and lowly <S%H1800><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> And they will take <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

"The remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> wrong <S%H9390><s%> And tell <S%H1696><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> lies, <S%H3577><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> will a deceitful <S%H9652><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> Be found <S%H4672><s%> in their mouths; <S%H6310><s%> For they shall feed <S%H7462><s%> and lie <S%H7257><s%> down <S%H7257><s%> With no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> to make them tremble. <S%H2729><s%>"

Shout <S%H7442><s%> for joy, <S%H7442><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion! <S%H6726><s%> Shout <S%H7321><s%> [in triumph,] O Israel! <S%H3478><s%> Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> and exult <S%H5937><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> [your] heart, <S%H3820><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jerusalem! <S%H3389><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has taken <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> [His] judgments <S%H4941><s%> against you, He has cleared <S%H6437><s%> away <S%H6437><s%> your enemies. <S%H340><s%> The King <S%H4428><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> is in your midst; <S%H7130><s%> You will fear <S%H3372><s%> disaster <S%H9563><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more. <S%H5750><s%>

In that day <S%H3117><s%> it will be said <S%H559><s%> to Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> "Do not be afraid, <S%H3372><s%> O Zion; <S%H6726><s%> Do not let your hands <S%H3027><s%> fall <S%H7503><s%> limp. <S%H7503><s%>

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is in your midst, <S%H7130><s%> A victorious <S%H3467><s%> warrior. <S%H1368><s%> He will exult <S%H7797><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you with joy, <S%H8057><s%> He will be quiet <S%H2790><s%> in His love, <S%H160><s%> He will rejoice <S%H1523><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you with shouts <S%H7440><s%> of joy. <S%H7440><s%>

"I will gather <S%H622><s%> those who grieve <S%H3013><s%> about <S%H4480><s%> the appointed <S%H4150><s%> feasts <S%H4150><s%> â€“ They came <S%H1961><s%> from you, [O Zion;] [The] reproach <S%H2781><s%> [of exile] is a burden <S%H4864><s%> on them.

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am going to deal <S%H6213><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%> With all <S%H3605><s%> your oppressors, <S%H6031><s%> I will save <S%H3467><s%> the lame <S%H6760><s%> And gather <S%H6908><s%> the outcast, <S%H5080><s%> And I will turn <S%H7760><s%> their shame <S%H1322><s%> into praise <S%H8416><s%> and renown <S%H8034><s%> In all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

"At that time <S%H6256><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> you in, Even at the time <S%H6256><s%> when I gather <S%H6908><s%> you together; Indeed, <S%H3588><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> you renown <S%H8034><s%> and praise <S%H8416><s%> Among all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> When I restore <S%H7725><s%> your fortunes <S%H7622><s%> before your eyes, <S%H5869><s%>" Says <S%H559><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
